description.narrative: Together with our partners, we will equip dairy farmers from eight existing Milk Bulking Groups (MBGs) with training and technical support that will strengthen their dairy husbandry practices. MBGs will strengthen existing linkages between smallholder dairy farmer groups and various business service providers such as dairy feed manufacturers, microfinance institutions and banks. This will result in the transformation of MBGs into business hubs that will improve access to resources and services ultimately contributing toward the competitiveness of the dairy value chain. We also will facilitate farmers exchange visits so dairy producers can gain experience and share knowledge and skills with their peers. For example, training and demonstrations on forage/fodder production will help address livestock feed deficiency periods that reduce milk yields. We also will help farmers gain access to artificial insemination services to improve the quality of local cattle and increase milk production.
